title: Phenomenal value! Large 1br, serene, great views, great light!
posting_body: ['VIDEO LINK HERE:', 'https://youtu.be/JCEYM3EzAxo', 'Exceptional value!', 'Large pre-war 1br in Chlesea / Nomad area, amazing central location, close to trains.', 'High ceilings, multiple large windows, serene, nice views, good light, decorative fireplace.', 'Three flights up.', 'Video was taken when they were finishing up the renovation, apartment is now totally finished and looks fantastic.', 'Small, friendly landlord requires 1 month rent and 1 month security and out of town guarantors are accepted as needed.', 'Minimum one year lease.', 'No short term.', 'We are a long-time local realtor specializing in the areas we know and love best, happy to assist our clients through these difficult markets.', 'The landlord requires that we ask prospective tenants a few questions before showing the unit, text 516.262.3693 for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Nick and Pam', '516.262.3696', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, AND 4 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST AND WEST VILLAGE, LES, UNION SQUARE, SOHO, GRAMERCY AND KIPS BAY.', 'CALL US TODAY AND WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST IN YOUR SEARCH.', 'ALSO CHECK OUT NICK’S BLOG FOR THE BEST OF EATING AND DRINKING IN THE EAST VILLAGE!', '<URL>/', 'I have several other studios, 1brs, 2brs and studios in Chelsea / Hells Kitchen / Kips Bay / Murray Hill from $3300 - $5300 for June and July in lovely full service buildings as well as many walk up units further downtown.']
